There’s a horizontal rule below this.

Here is an unordered list:

  • Item foo
  • Item bar
  • Item baz
  • Item zip

And an ordered list:

  1. Item one
  2. Item two
  3. Item three
  4. Item four

And a nested list:

  • level 1 item
    • level 2 item
    • level 2 item
      • level 3 item
      • level 3 item
  • level 1 item
    • level 2 item
    • level 2 item
    • level 2 item
  • level 1 item
    • level 2 item
    • level 2 item
  • level 1 item

About me

Hi, I am Shahnewaz Shuva, a doctoral researcher at the Institute of Applied Analysis and Numerical Simulation, University of Stuttgart. This site is an attempt to improve my technical and non-technical skills. You can find my full profile here.
